https://www.myjoyonline.com/eight-ways-t.title: Eight ways to stay happier this year, according to science
https://www.myjoyonline.com/eight-ways-t.summary: Some people are born to be happier than others. But whether you're the kind of person who sings in the shower and dances in the rain, or of a more dour inclination, contentment isn't just something that happens to us. We can all change our habits to coax more of it into our lives.
